医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
新的 CRISPR 模型可更深入地了解前列腺癌转移使用 CRISPR（一种允许科学家切割和编辑基因的先进技术）的新临床前模型使威尔康奈尔医学研究人员及其同事对前列腺癌如何扩散或转移有了更深入的了解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240923/New-CRISPR-model-offers-deeper-insight-into-prostate-cancer-metastasis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240923/New-CRISPR-model-offers-deeper-insight-into-prostate-cancer-metastasis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dbf084c5-1a64-4ba7-a330-771b07d6b9db Mon, 23 Sep 2024 14:17:33 -0400 New CRISPR model offers deeper insight into prostate cancer metastasis
研究表明大流行时期儿童的自闭症风险并未增加哥伦比亚大学瓦格洛斯内科医生和外科医生学院的研究人员发现，在大流行第一年出生的儿童，包括那些在子宫内接触过新冠病毒的儿童，与未接触过新冠病毒或大流行前的儿童相比，自闭症筛查结果呈阳性的可能性并不高。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240923/Study-shows-no-increased-autism-risk-for-pandemic-era-children.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240923/Study-shows-no-increased-autism-risk-for-pandemic-era-children.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5276f752-f8cc-4560-a659-83fe98b7eb17 Mon, 23 Sep 2024 14:10:07 -0400 Study shows no increased autism risk for pandemic-era children
远程医疗提高护理质量和医生满意度纽约州立大学宾厄姆顿大学的最新研究表明，远程医疗实际上提高了护理质量，并提高了医生对提供护理的满意度。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240923/Telemedicine-enhances-care-quality-and-physician-satisfaction.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240923/Telemedicine-enhances-care-quality-and-physical-satisfaction.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f7205b77-5d90-459d-928a-f760d5d3a281 Mon, 23 Sep 2024 14:03:54 -0400 Telemedicine enhances care quality and physician satisfaction
迫切呼吁对抗生素研究进行长期投资抗生素耐药性是全球公共卫生威胁。现代卫生系统依靠抗生素来预防和治疗感染，对新药的需求迫切。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240923/Urgent-call-for-long-term-investment-in-antibiotic-research.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240923/Urgent-call-for-long-term-investment-in-antibiotic-research.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=65c658eb-9edb-4f50-b390-95fc0b03ed9d Mon, 23 Sep 2024 12:44:00 -0400 Urgent call for long-term investment in antibiotic research
热疹疾病相关病毒病原体的流行病学宣布在 Zoonoses 杂志上发表新文章。本研究的目的是监测与热性皮疹疾病 (FRI) 相关的病毒病原体谱及其流行病学。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240923/Epidemiology-of-viral-pathogens-involved-in-febrile-rash-illness.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240923/Epidemiology-of-viral-pathogens-involved-in-febrile-rash-illness.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9d4df1d5-0a65-49c4-b91e-421d537140b9 Mon, 23 Sep 2024 12:28:30 -0400 Epidemiology of viral pathogens involved in febrile rash illness
CRISPR-Cas9 在对抗蚊媒疾病中的作用宣布在 Zoonoses 杂志上发表新文章。随着全球变暖的加剧，蚊子活动区域不断扩大，加上自然环境的变化和杀虫剂的滥用，进一步增强了蚊子的抵抗力，使世界面临蚊媒疾病的风险增加。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240923/The-role-of-CRISPR-Cas9-in-combating-mosquito-borne-diseases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240923/The-role-of-CRISPR-Cas9-in-combating-mosquito-borne-diseases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=34bbd246-ce9e-43b2-a9f7-d0fa240a8449 Mon, 23 Sep 2024 12:21:00 -0400 The role of CRISPR-Cas9 in combating mosquito-borne diseases
工作场所化学品风险评估新建议发布DFG 工作区域化学物质健康危害调查常设参议院委员会现已发布其关于工作场所使用物质风险评估的最新研究建议的英文版。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240923/New-recommendations-for-workplace-chemical-risk-assessment-published.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240923/New-recommendations-for-workplace-chemical-risk-assessment-published.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a89936f1-292c-4bac-8da1-de8379b3b91c Mon, 23 Sep 2024 12:14:32 -0400 New recommendations for workplace chemical risk assessment published
新闻-医疗宣布与世界孤儿药大会合作在欧洲世界孤儿药大会上与 2000 多名与会者互动，重点关注基因治疗和罕见疾病治疗进展策略。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240923/News-Medical-announces-partnership-with-World-Orphan-Drug-Congress.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240923/News-Medical-announces-partnership-with-World-Orphan-Drug-Congress.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2aeebd6d-5c22-4bbd-a96f-6bfcfcc51cf6 Mon, 23 Sep 2024 12:07:00 -0400 News-Medical announces partnership with World Orphan Drug Congress
民意调查显示，近一半的老年人计划接种更新的 COVID-19 疫苗新更新的 COVID-19 疫苗刚刚抵达全国药房和诊所，一项新的民意调查显示，近一半 50 岁及以上的人计划接种该疫苗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240923/Nearly-half-of-people-older-adults-plan-to-get-the-updated-COVID-19-vaccine-poll-suggests.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240923/Nearly-half-of-people-older-adults-plan-to-get-the-updated-COVID-19-vaccine-poll-suggests.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4a21709f-c58d-4909-bd55-8f1a041969d8 Mon, 23 Sep 2024 09:28:33 -0400 Nearly half of people older adults plan to get the updated COVID-19 vaccine, poll suggests
增强的 TnpB 蛋白为基因编辑提供了新的可能性CRISPR-Cas 广泛用于研究和医学领域，用于编辑、插入、删除或调节生物体中的基因。 TnpB 是这种著名的“基因剪刀”的祖先，但它要小得多，因此更容易转运到细胞中。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240923/Enhanced-TnpB- Protein-offers-new-possibilities-for-gene-editing.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240923/Enhanced-TnpB- Protein-offers-new-possibilities-for-gene-editing.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=338bf06d-ed06-4712-9749-ff106fbf2a10 Mon, 23 Sep 2024 09:23:31 -0400 Enhanced TnpB protein offers new possibilities for gene editing
